message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm really looking to stay under $12,000.  Would you consider $11,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to stay under $12,000, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500.
Alice, $13,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,500.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $13,000, but that's as low as I can go.
